title: NIDALEE GLITCHING AROUND THE MAP! CMON FOR REALS?!
body:
it has been weeks or a month or two that summoners including myself have witnessed Nidalee glitching ( smoothly out of bushes and around the map or some kinda thingy, it looks as if she drifts across in one direction and then the other within a split second or so )

so annoying to see! please fix it or just disable her until the issue is resolved.



gg wp rito!

replies.body: Yeah it's been a constant for myself since the 4.20 patch
AGREED its so weird i thought it was just me playing games to long not getting enough sleep
